com.groundcontrol.game.view.elements

Class ViewFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groundcontrol.game.view.elements.ViewFactory

  • public class ViewFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory that creates view for all the gameModel elements, using the factory pattern

      • updatePauseElements

        public static <T extends ElementModel> void updatePauseElements(java.util.List<T> models,
                                                                GameView gv,
                                                                boolean pause)
        Pauses or unpauses all the animations present in models
        Type Parameters:
        T - any class that extends Element Model
        Parameters:
        models - the models to be paused/unpaused
        gv - the game view
        pause - true to be paused, false will contnue
